title: Single Cup of Joy - AeroPress
preparation_steps: Grind 10g of coffee to a coarse setting (34 clicks on Comandante).
Assemble AeroPress in the inverted position.
Pre-heat your AeroPress and server while rinsing the paper filter.
Add the ground coffee to the chamber.

brewing_steps.instruction: Pour 130ml of 93°C water over your coffee.
brewing_steps.audio_script: Start the timer. Pour 130 milliliters of 93-degree water over the coffee. Ensure all grounds are wet.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Vierte 130ml de agua a 93°C sobre tu café.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Inicia el cronómetro. Vierte 130 mililitros de agua a 93 grados sobre el café. Asegúrate de que todo el café esté mojado.

brewing_steps.instruction: Wait patiently until 2:30. Do not stir.
brewing_steps.audio_script: Now, wait patiently until the timer reaches 2 minutes and 30 seconds. Do not stir the coffee.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Ahora, espera pacientemente hasta que el cronómetro alcance 2 minutos y 30 segundos. No revuelvas el café.

brewing_steps.instruction: At 2:30, flip the AeroPress and start pressing. Aim to finish at 4:00 (90s press).
brewing_steps.audio_script: Flip the AeroPress and start pressing. This is a very slow press—take your time and aim to finish exactly at the 4-minute mark.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: A las 2:30, voltea el AeroPress y comienza a presionar. Termina a las 4:00 (90s de presión).
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Voltea el AeroPress y comienza a presionar. Esta es una presión muy lenta—tómate tu tiempo y termina exactamente a los 4 minutos.

what_to_expect.description: Inspired by SCA cupping methods, this recipe uses a coarse grind, long steep time (4 minutes), and no agitation (stirring) to bring out the best sweetness in natural and honey processed coffees. It's designed specifically for a single 10g cup that stays at the ideal temperature from start to finish.
what_to_expect.audio_script: The Single Cup of Joy is inspired by SCA cupping methods. It uses a coarse grind, a long steep, and no agitation to highlight sweetness, especially in natural and honey processed coffees. Designed for a perfect single serving.
what_to_expect.description_es: Una taza equilibrada y reconfortante perfecta para el día a día. Esta receta es accesible para principiantes y produce resultados consistentes con cualquier tipo de café.
what_to_expect.audio_script_es: Esta receta produce una taza equilibrada y reconfortante. Es perfecta para principiantes y funciona bien con cualquier tipo de café. Espera un sabor suave, dulce y sin complicaciones.

notes: Inspired by SCA cupping. Uses a 1:13 ratio with 10g coffee. Inverted method, coarse grind, no stirring. The long 90-second press provides the agitation needed at the end. Best for natural/honey processed beans.
notes_es: Una receta sencilla y reconfortante para el día a día. Equilibrada, accesible y perfecta para cualquier tipo de café.
preparation_steps_es: Enjuaga el filtro de papel con agua caliente.
Ensambla el AeroPress en posición estándar sobre tu taza.
Muele 15g de café a molienda media.
